channel.title: I accendentaly removed java from my computer
channel.description: Ook i was removing some programs fomr my computer and i accedentally removed "java" and now i cant go on "limewire" "moparscape" ..etc: can u plz give the link so i can download java so can i go back on those programs :confused:[br][size=1]Posted on: January 12, 2007, 12:18:59 PM[/size][hr][glow=blue,2,300]NeverMind Closed i got "java run time environment " ok sorry about my noobness[/glow][br][size=1]Posted on: January 12, 2007, 12:28:12 PM[/size][hr]omg??? my programs r still not working?? i downloaded "java run time environment" but it still dontsnt work

man im such a dumb one for deleting that it all started bcuz i wanted to create a pserver but i accedentally delted my verson of java it was an old verson…though…now im grounded for like 500m years bcuz my mom cant use limewire cuz of java…

im 14 i been useing a computer since i was…12 ok and i never never had this problem ok so thats why i been having so much problems…ok

I can tell if you are still using Windows 98, even Microsoft has admitted that it is outdated, that is why they have discontinued services for it. Upgrade to XP.

item.source: I accendentaly removed java from my computer

item.title: I accendentaly removed java from my computer
item.dc:creator: @Rictoo Rictoo
item.description:
@Rictoo wrote:

  1. Open My Computer, go to C:, Program Files, and then Java. If the only Java folder you have has the letters ‘jdk’ in it, go to step #2, if you have a folder with the letters ‘jre’ in it, then open it, go to the ‘bin’ folder and go to step #3

  2. Open the jdk folder, open ‘jre’, open ‘bin’ and do step #3

  3. Copy the link in the address bar (eg., C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.6.0\bin), and put that into the PATH env variable

Read full topic

item.description:
@Rictoo wrote:

Windows 98 ME, 98 ME… hmmmm, never heard of it =/ You either have 98 or ME. But anyway…

  1. RESTART YOUR COMPUTER

  2. #1 should work, but if it doesn’t just add your jre bin dir to the PATH environment variable
